articles.author: Jamie Crawley
articles.title: WisdomTree Gets Green Light to List Bitcoin, Ether ETPs on London Stock Exchange - CoinDesk
articles.description: The LSE said in March it would accept applications for bitcoin and ether exchange-traded products in the second quarter after the FCA adjusted its stance on such products.
articles.content:
• Exchange-traded products from WisdomTree and 21Shares are set to start trading on the London Stock Exchange on May 28.
